page.title: 01 Welcome To Felixstowe!
page.content: Welcome to Felixstowe.I am your tourism guide.We are on a double decker bus which has an open top.You should be able to feel the wind in your face.The engine has started up, can you feel the bus shaking? We started off at the bus station and we are going into Sea Road.I can smell the salt already,can you? The bus has stopped. Feel the sand,water and stones. If I take you nearer to the sea you will hear the waves splashing on the ground. Can you hear the people talking and chattering? At the docks, if you listen you can hear the horn of a ship leaving the port. Can you hear the lorries going past and smell the fumes? Now we shall go to the amusements and Charlie Mannings' Fun Fair. Look at the laughing clown, isn't he jolly! Listen to the machines whirring, and the people laughing and screaming!
